text: $ADP $AVGO $COST $CTRA $DE $INTU $LEN $MCHP $MTB $UNH $V $VICI $VIG - Our Top 10 Picks For Dividend Growth Stocks - June 2023
author: Beeken Healthcare

text:
Personally I like $SCHD and $VYM with maybe some $VIG as well. $DGRO is another to consider. 

Could look at a small position in $JEPI or $JEPQ if you want high income, but shouldn’t be more than 10-15% of the portfolio.
author: The Dividend Breeder

text:
I do think $VYM has a place in a portfolio. However, $SCHD provides me slightly lower yield, growing at more rapid pace.

$DGRO has a much more rapid dividend growth rate and double the price appreciation the past 5 years. 

$DGRO and $VIG are the best compliments to $SCHD IMO.
author: Ethan
